title: Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: A Comprehensive Survey
authors: John Abascal, Jonathan Ullman, Alina Oprea
abstract: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of privacy-preserving techniques in machine learning, covering differential privacy, federated learning, and secure multiparty computation approaches.

title: Differential Privacy in Deep Learning: Challenges and Solutions
abstract: We explore the challenges of implementing differential privacy in deep learning systems and propose novel solutions for maintaining model utility while preserving privacy guarantees.
